article: a caracas court has ordered the arrest of six former petroleos de venezuela -lrb- pdvsa -rrb- executives , who led the recent two-month strike that crippled venezuela 's oil production , their lawyer said .
abstract: venezuelan court orders arrest of six oil strike leaders
